page.title: 18A Survey of Places of Work
page.content:
31 of the children in the school were asked the question "Where does your Dad work?" 12 Dads work in the same place as they live, as follows. Faldingworth 4 Buslingthorpe 1 Wickenby 2 Lissington 2 Snelland 2 Toft Newton 1 Dads were travelling as follows. Faldingworth to; Sturton-by-Stow 1, Welton 2, RAF Scampton 1, Branston 1, Dunholme 1, Mkt Rasen 1, Newark 1. Lissington to; Gainsborough 1, Bardney 1. Toft Newton to; Mkt Rasen 1, Leeds 1*, RAF Wittering 1*, Germany 1*, Middle Rasen 1, commercial travelling 1. Snarford to; Boston 1, Wragby 1. Wickenby to; Lincoln 1.
Dads marked * do not return home each evening.
